name: Phone Buddy
description:
[School Project] This app is a small, affordable (Free but with advertisements) and entertaining piece of software that will hopefully help your mental state and spread awareness about mental health in young people.

This app also contains a unique Art Style,  many Themes to keep user entertained. features such as Clicking Button! and cool Never Seen Before Particles.

More Themes Coming Soon! … unless I'm not bothered.
